page.original: &ltTBL>.RELATION_CHANGE() Syntax &ltTBL>.RELATION_CHANGE() Description The &ltTBL>.RELATION_CHANGE() method changes a relationship, or link, between two open tables. The changed relationship is defined through the Relation dot variable. Example Refer to <TBL>.RELATION_ADD() for an example. See Also Table Functions and Methods, Set Functions and Methods
